text:
Hey y'all - we implemented a third-party API integration to utilize deal data within workflows. However, the module we had created is linking to the line item amount, but we need to link to the line item price per a specific deal. Could someone please share if this is possible? If so, what would be a workaround for this?

This is what the current module looks like for reference:
Here is what our current code looks like as well:
<@U063T4W61PG> its possible most likely needing to query HS to get the specific deals info

Hi guys, it’s my first time here! I need to do an integration of HubSpot with our ERP, I’m using <http://tray.io|tray.io>

 I need a HubSpot connector or some http request that can see when an email was sent in HubSpot, I don't know if anyone has ever done this. 

Thanks for your help!
